content: ......=========================== FOR SALE ===========================......WHAT: mining rig case fully equiped with a 3300W power supply + 2 x Nvidia CMP 90 HXWHERE: EU based (Western)SHIPPING: EU ONLY (at buyer's expenses)PAYMENT: EURO/BTC/ETH/USDCESCROW: ok (at buyer's expenses)For sale due to change of project, a complete mining rig equipped with:- 2 x NVIDIA CMP 90HX delivering 100 MHs (minimum) each for 250W only.- Custom aluminum case with 5 exhaust fans.- 3300W power supply wired for 8 graphics cards + SATA- ONDA AK4025-D8P-70-2U (ver:1.00) motherboard with support for 8 graphics cards, 2 USB 3.0 ports, one RJ45 (Gbps) port, one HDMI port for video output;- Intel Celeron 2980U processor running at 1.6 Ghz;- RAM of 4 Gb DDR4 PC4-21300 2666 Mhz;- Storage of 128 Gb of SSD type M2;Nvidia CMP cards are the best graphics cards on the market for mining. They consume very little power and heat.They can be compared to Nvidia 3080ti but consume less power. (Between the 3080 and the 3090ti). The mining rig is BRAND NEW.It has been plugged in and tested to make sure it works properly. The CMP 90HX cards are also new. Currently the rig delivers 200 Mhs and can still accommodate 6 graphics cards.Asking 1000$ per card and 400$ for the rig case.Total excl. shipping: 2400$ (about 2240â‚¬ at current rate).Shipping carrier at buyer's expenses.
